title: Broadening my Horizons Living With Epilepsy
description: This is the real-life story of the author's life growing up with epilepsy from a child to becoming an adult. With obstacles ahead of him, what could be done to sort this health issue out for him? This book features drama, life-threatening situations, motivation & inspirational situations that could help the reader who might have an issue themselves. An inspirational and motivational read that will get the reader to keep turning over to the next page to see what happens next right through to the end.Benefits of this book
author: P.J. Churchill
